channel.title: Blog on Will's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Will's blog

item.title: The no-nonsense beginner's guide to Japanese cooking
item.description: Japanese food. You either love it or hate it, but if you’re reading this, you probably love it. This post will teach you everything you need to know to get started with some decilious and simple dishes.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
